main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Thibodaux, Louisiana on May 13, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as round and yellow with red flames at the bottom., The observation was made by a civilian using a telescope., The object was visible for 3 to 5 minutes and was seen every clear night thereafter., The object was first observed at 45 degrees elevation and 240 degrees azimuth., The sighting was reported to be reliable with more than one person having seen it.
sighted object: one round yellow object with red flames
